results.title: Efficacy and safety profiles of a new S(-)-amlodipine nicotinate formulation versus racemic amlodipine besylate in adult Korean patients with mild to moderate hypertension: an 8-week, multicenter, randomized, double-blind, double-dummy, parallel-group, phase III, noninferiority clinical trial.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: The aim of this study was to compare the efficacy and safety profiles of @<m>CHEMICAL_amlodipine_nicotinate</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C519553 @@@S(-)-amlodipine nicotinate@@@ with those of @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ in adult Korean @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with mild to moderate @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ (diastolic @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@blood pressure@@@ [DBP] >or=90 mm Hg and <or=109 mm Hg).

citations.NLM: Kim SA, Park S, Chung N, Lim DS, Yang JY, Oh BH, Tahk SJ, Ahn TH. Efficacy and safety profiles of a new S(-)-amlodipine nicotinate formulation versus racemic amlodipine besylate in adult Korean patients with mild to moderate hypertension: an 8-week, multicenter, randomized, double-blind, double-dummy, parallel-group, phase III, noninferiority clinical trial. Clin Ther. 2008 May;30(5):845-57. PMID: 18555932
citations.BibTeX: @article{18555932, title={Efficacy and safety profiles of a new S(-)-amlodipine nicotinate formulation versus racemic amlodipine besylate in adult Korean patients with mild to moderate hypertension: an 8-week, multicenter, randomized, double-blind, double-dummy, parallel-group, phase III, noninferiority clinical trial.}, author={Kim SA and Park S and Chung N and Lim DS and Yang JY and Oh BH and Tahk SJ and Ahn TH}, journal={Clin Ther}, volume={30}, number={5}, pages={845-57}}

results.title: Quantification of pedal edema during treatment with S(-)-amlodipine nicotinate versus amlodipine besylate in female Korean patients with mild to moderate hypertension: a 12-week, multicenter, randomized, double-blind, active-controlled, phase IV clinical trial.
results.text_hl: Female @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with mild to moderate @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ were randomly assigned to receive either @<m>CHEMICAL_amlodipine_nicotinate</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C519553 @@@S(-)-amlodipine nicotinate@@@ 2.5 to 5 mg once daily or @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ 5 to 10 mg once daily for 12 weeks.

citations.NLM: Oh GC, Lee HY, Kang HJ, Zo JH, Choi DJ, Oh BH. Quantification of pedal edema during treatment with S(-)-amlodipine nicotinate versus amlodipine besylate in female Korean patients with mild to moderate hypertension: a 12-week, multicenter, randomized, double-blind, active-controlled, phase IV clinical trial. Clin Ther. 2012 Sep;34(9):1940-7. PMID: 22925988
citations.BibTeX: @article{22925988, title={Quantification of pedal edema during treatment with S(-)-amlodipine nicotinate versus amlodipine besylate in female Korean patients with mild to moderate hypertension: a 12-week, multicenter, randomized, double-blind, active-controlled, phase IV clinical trial.}, author={Oh GC and Lee HY and Kang HJ and Zo JH and Choi DJ and Oh BH}, journal={Clin Ther}, volume={34}, number={9}, pages={1940-7}}
